name: Eye'N'Stein
description:
You've partied a little too much and wake up alone in a forest. You notice strange obelisks surrounding you. That's how you escaped from the forest....

Controls
WASD/Arrows: Move
Shift: Sprint
Mouse: Look Around
E / [LMB]: Interact
ESC: Return to main menu

This game was made for the GDFG Monthly Jam #20.

Be warned: This game can be very unfair

HINT:
You may want to blend ...IT... with your flashlight.

Credits:
Sounds/Programming/Modeling/Design/Art: FreschGames
Used Software: Stable Diffusion
